explanation: [0-0] Inside a church, a white-haired bishop in a robe and glasses stands on the left, holding St. Edward's Crown in both hands. On the right sits King Charles, wearing a golden robe and holding a scepter, seated on a throne. Queen Camilla and other members of the royal family, dressed in white gowns, stand solemnly by, watching the King.

[0-4] First, the white-haired bishop raises St. Edward's Crown high with both hands. The camera zooms in for a close-up of the crown, revealing numerous gemstones that sparkle brilliantly.
